workflowSteps.details: Prior authorization request submitted by Sarah Johnson
workflowSteps.outcome: Case PA-2024-001 created and queued for processing
workflowSteps.comments: High priority case - suspected brain tumor

workflowSteps.details: Collected 5 documents: Prior Auth Form, Patient Medical History, MRI Report, Physician Notes, Insurance Card
AI-powered OCR and data extraction from all documents
workflowSteps.outcome: Successfully extracted: Patient demographics, Clinical history, Diagnosis (ICD-10: C71.9), Procedure code (CPT: 70553), Insurance details

workflowSteps.details: Rules engine evaluation: Coverage verified, Gold status patient, Standard procedure cost $2,500
workflowSteps.outcome: Auto-approval criteria met - No clinical review required
workflowSteps.comments: Patient has Gold status coverage with no coverage limits. Standard neurological procedure within policy guidelines.

workflowSteps.details: Blue Cross Blue Shield (BC123456789) - Gold Plan
workflowSteps.outcome: Active coverage confirmed. Deductible: $500 met. Coverage limit: None for diagnostic imaging
workflowSteps.comments: Patient eligible for procedure. No prior authorization denials in history.

workflowSteps.details: Evaluated against ACR Appropriateness Criteria for brain MRI
workflowSteps.outcome: Procedure appropriate for suspected brain tumor. Meets medical necessity criteria.
workflowSteps.comments: Supporting evidence: Progressive headaches, visual disturbances, neurological deficits. Appropriate imaging modality selected.

workflowSteps.details: AI analysis of clinical data, guidelines, and policy
workflowSteps.comments: Strong clinical justification. No red flags identified. Procedure code matches diagnosis. Standard of care met.

workflowSteps.details: Automated approval based on AI recommendation and policy rules
workflowSteps.comments: Case meets all criteria for automated approval. No human review required.

workflowSteps.details: Generated approval letter with authorization details
workflowSteps.comments: Letter includes: Authorization number, approved procedure, valid dates (30 days), provider instructions

workflowSteps.details: Notification sent to Sarah Johnson at UCLA Medical Center
workflowSteps.comments: Provider portal updated with approval status and downloadable letter

workflowSteps.outcome: EMRPatient ID: EPIC_5A3D7F92, Order placed successfully
workflowSteps.comments: EMRintegration successful. Hospital notified. Order ID: ORD_7K2M9P4N8Q

keyFindings.clinicalJustification: Patient presents with progressive neurological symptoms (headaches, visual disturbances) requiring diagnostic imaging to rule out intracranial pathology
keyFindings.medicalNecessity: MRI with contrast is medically necessary for suspected brain tumor diagnosis per ACR guidelines
keyFindings.policyCompliance: Procedure covered under patient's Gold plan with no restrictions or limits
keyFindings.costEfficiency: Standard procedure cost of $2,500 is within expected range for brain MRI with contrast

approvalDetails.reviewType: Automated Review - No Clinical Panel Required

qualityMetrics.patientSatisfactionImpact: High - Fast approval reduces wait time
